title: Whole Wheat Bread Pudding

directions: ["Remove crust.", "Cut in cubes.", "Soak in water and squeeze out. Place in 2-quart baking dish; mix and add milk.", "Put in hot oven. When it starts to bake well, then turn down heat.", "Stir often for 2 hours.", "Serve hot or cold with whipped cream."]

title: Mild Mexican Casserole

directions: ["Brown the meat, onions and peppers.", "Drain the fat.", "Add the milk, enchilada sauce and 2 soups.", "(It works better if you combine all this before you add it to the pan.)", "In a Pyrex casserole, alternate the tortilla chips, meat mixture and a little cheese twice, ending with the bulk of the cheese on the top. title: Potato Candy

directions: ["Mash potato while hot and beat in the sugar.", "Roll out on a board.", "Cover with peanut butter.", "Roll up and slice."]

title: Cool And Easy Pie

Add enough ice to cold water to make 1 ; cup.", "Add Jell-O and stir until ice is melted.", "Add Cool Whip; stir with whisk until well blended.", "Refrigerate 15 to 20 minutes or until mixture is very thick and will mound.", "Spoon into crust.", "Refrigerate at least 4 hours or overnight."]

title: Shrimp Delight

directions: ["Melt butter in casserole.", "Cut up and blend all ingredients. Bake for 1 hour at 250\u00b0. Stir after 30 minutes.", "This makes a big casserole."]

title: Strawberry Pie

directions: ["Cook sugar, water and cornstarch until clear; cook slowly, then take off stove and add jello and strawberries.", "Put in baked pie crusts.", "Makes 2 pies."]

title: Carrie'S Devilish Eggs

directions: ["Slice hard-boiled eggs in half; remove yolks.", "Set halves aside.", "Mash yolks with a fork in a bowl.", "Add sugar, cayenne pepper, mustard, mayonnaise, salt and pepper to taste.", "Mash yolks.", "Blend well.", "Spoon yolk mixture into halves.", "Refrigerate. Keep covered.", "May omit cayenne pepper and add 1 or 2 tablespoons relish or minced onion."]

title: Oatmeal Raisin Muffins
ingredients: ["2 c. Oatmeal Raisin Crisp cereal", "1 c. milk", "3 Tbsp. vegetable oil", "1 egg", "1 1/4 c. flour", "1/3 c. brown sugar", "3 tsp. baking powder", "1 tsp. salt", "1/4 tsp. cinnamon", "1/8 tsp. nutmeg"]
directions: ["Mix cereal and milk in a large bowl; let stand until cereal is softened, about 3 minutes.", "Beat in oil and egg.", "Stir in remaining ingredients just until moistened.", "Divide batter into 12 muffin cups.", "Bake until golden brown, 16 to 20 minutes at 375\u00b0."]

title: Fried Corn

directions: ["Cut corn from cobs and scrape cobs to remove all milk.", "Heat butter and bacon drippings in a medium saucepan until hot.", "Add corn, water, salt and pepper.", "Cook uncovered over medium heat until mixture comes to a boil.", "Cover; reduce heat and simmer 10 to 12 minutes.", "Stir frequently.", "Serves 10."]

title: Cheese Cake
ingredients: ["1 pkg. graham crackers, crushed", "1/2 c. melted oleo", "1/4 c. sugar"]
directions: ["Mix together and form in bottom and sides of pie pan, greased."]

title: Never Fail Rolls
ingredients: ["1 c. butter", "3/4 c. sugar", "1 c. boiling water (to melt margarine)", "1 c. lukewarm water (for yeast)", "2 pkg. yeast (dry)", "2 eggs, beaten", "1 tsp. salt", "6 1/2 c. flour (about)"]
directions: ["Mix all ingredients; put in refrigerator for at least 2 hours. (Can be mixed at night and next day rolled out.", "Dough will be sticky.)", "Divide dough in 3 to 4 parts.", "Roll in circle; cut into pie shaped wedges.", "Roll up from the wide end to the narrow; place on oiled cookie sheet.", "Let rise.", "Bake at 375\u00b0 for 18 minutes. Enjoy."]

title: Macaroni And Cheese
ingredients: ["6 oz. elbow macaroni (1 1/2 c.)", "3 Tbsp. butter or margarine", "1/4 c. finely chopped onion", "2 Tbsp. all-purpose flour", "1/2 tsp. salt", "dash of pepper", "2 c. milk", "2 c. cubed American cheese", "1 medium tomato, sliced"]
directions: ["Cook macaroni according to package directions; drain.", "For cheese sauce, in a saucepan, melt butter or margarine.", "Cook onion in butter until tender, but not brown.", "Stir in the flour, salt and pepper.", "Add milk all at once; cook and stir until thickened and bubbly.", "Cook and stir 1 to 2 minutes more.", "Add cubed cheese; stir until melted."]

title: Gingersnaps

directions: ["Mix all (except flour) with a spoon as long as possible, then knead in flour with the hands until sufficient flour is used to make a delicate dough. Roll out thin, cut with cookie cutters and bake in a quick oven (375\u00b0 to 400\u00b0) for 7 to 10 minutes; less for thin cookies. Keep ingredients in a cool place until mixed."]

title: Easy Carrot Cake

directions: ["Combine first 5 ingredients and mix at medium speed for 3 minutes.", "Stir in next 2 ingredients.", "Bake in greased 9 x 13-inch pan at 350\u00b0 for 35 minutes.", "When cool, spread with cream cheese frosting."]

title: Crab Mold(Dip)
ingredients: ["1/4 c. mayonnaise", "1 can cream of mushroom soup", "6 oz. cream cheese", "1 envelope unflavored gelatin", "3 Tbsp. cold water", "3 green onions, chopped", "1/4 c. chopped celery", "1 small jar chipped pimentos", "dash of salt and pepper or seasoning of choice (Mrs. Dash is good)", "1 (7 oz.) can crab meat"]
directions: ["Cream mayonnaise and cream cheese together.", "Warm soup in small pan.", "Dissolve gelatin in water and add to soup.", "Add onions, celery, pimentos and seasonings into cream cheese mixture.", "Pour soup into cream cheese mixture; stir well.", "Add crab; mix well. Pour into a mold.", "Refrigerate 1 hour or more.", "Can serve from bowl like a dip or loosen by setting mold in hot water until side of mixture loosens from mold pan, then turn onto dish and serve with crackers or vegetables."]

title: Lemon Fluff Jello
ingredients: ["1 (3 oz.) pkg. lemon Jell-O", "1 c. boiling water", "large can crushed pineapple with juice", "8 oz. cream cheese", "1/2 c. sugar", "8 oz. Cool Whip", "1/2 c. chopped pecans (optional)"]
directions: ["Mix pineapple and sugar in saucepan and bring to a boil. Reduce heat and simmer on stove 15 minutes.", "Remove from heat and cool.", "Mix Jell-O and boiling water.", "Stir in softened cream cheese and mix well, then add pineapple and nuts.", "Chill until thickened, then fold in Cool Whip.", "Put in Pyrex dish and chill until firm."]

title: Easy Fruit Salad
ingredients: ["3 oz. pkg. Jell-O", "12 oz. cottage cheese", "8 oz. Cool Whip", "1 can fruit, drained"]
directions: ["Mix cottage cheese and dry Jell-O.", "Let sit 5 minutes.", "Stir well again.", "Add fruit and Cool Whip.", "Refrigerate."]

title: Pizza Crust
ingredients: ["2 1/2 to 3 c. all-purpose flour", "1 Tbsp. sugar", "1 pkg. RapidRise yeast", "1 1/2 tsp. salt", "1 c. warm water", "3 Tbsp. peanut oil"]
directions: ["In a large bowl, combine flour, sugar, undissolved yeast and salt. Gradually add water and 2 tablespoons peanut oil to flour mixture. Beat 2 minutes at medium speed of mixer, scraping bowl occasionally. Stir in enough remaining flour to make a soft dough. Knead on lightly floured surface until smooth and elastic, about 8 to 10 minutes. Cover and let rest 10 minutes. Roll dough to a 12-inch circle; place on a greased pizza pan. Form a standing rim on crust. Prick dough with fork", "randomly. Let rest 10 minutes. Prebake at 450\u00b0 for 5 minutes."]

title: Amber'S Top Ramenlubbock, Texas
ingredients: ["1 pkg. Top Ramen - any flavor cuz I like them all!"]
directions: ["Take the package of Top Ramen and smash it till it's in small pieces.", "Cut open the package and put it in a microwave bowl. Empty seasoning into the bowl too.", "Add enough water to cover the noodles and microwave for 1 1/2 minutes.", "Stir and microwave for another 1 1/2 minutes.", "It's done.", "My Nan adds salsa to hers but I don't."]

title: Hash Brown Casserole

title: Chop Suey

Add chopped celery and boil until cooked.", "Add boiled onions and bean sprouts.", "Thicken juice with cornstarch and simmer awhile. Add brown gravy sauce for color. Serve over cooked rice and top with chow mein noodles and soy sauce to taste."]

title: Pam'S Barbecue Ribs

title: Hot Chicken Salad

title: Randy'S Smoked Turkey

directions: ["Thaw", "turkey", "in", "refrigerator.", "Boil 2 quarts of water and add", "brown\tsugar", "and Tender Quick.", "Mix well.", "Pump this into turkey", "with", "a", "cooking", "syringe.\tLeave in brine in the refrigerator", "for 3 days before cooking.", "Then cover with foil or use a", "cooking bag and bake in oven or smoker at 325\u00b0 until thermometer reaches 180\u00b0 to 185\u00b0."]

title: Fried Apple Pies
ingredients: ["4 cups of peeled and slice apples", "4 cups of water", "1/2 cup of sugar", "4 teaspoons of cinnamon", "6 cups of flour", "1 teaspoon of salt", "1 tablespoon of baking powder", "1 1/2 cups of vegetable shortening", "1 cup of milk", "2 cups of vegetable oil"]
directions: ["In a saucepan, combine apples and water. Simmer until tender, then cool. Mash apples, stir in sugar and cinnamon. Chill; combine flour, salt and baking powder. Cut in shortening until well blended. Add milk, a little at a time to form dough. Chill for 1 hour. Roll dough out to 1/4 inch thick. Cut into 4 inch rounds. Place about 2 tablespoons of the apple filling in the center of each circle. Moisten the edges with water then fold the pastry in half, pressing the edges together. Heat oil to 370\u00b0 and fry the pies until brown."]

title: Lou Abate'S Pizza Dough(Low-Fat)
ingredients: ["1 pkg. active dry yeast", "2/3 c. warm water (about 110~)", "2 tsp. sugar", "1/2 tsp. salt", "3 Tbsp. olive oil", "1 1/3 c. plus 1/2 c. unbleached flour"]
directions: ["In a large bowl, dissolve the yeast in the water.", "Let stand for 5 minutes to soften.", "Add the sugar, salt and olive oil.", "Let stand for 1 minute.", "Add the 1 1/3 cups of flour and mix to blend until dough is elastic.", "Stir in 1/2 cup more flour to make the dough soft.", "Knead on a floured surface for 10 to 12 minutes or until the dough is smooth and springy.", "Place in a greased bowl, turn the dough to grease the top.", "Cover and place in a warm place until it rises to double its size (about 1 hour).", "Punch the dough down, knead for 3 to 5 minutes, cover and let rise for another hour."]

title: Christmas Pickles

directions: ["Fill jar with fresh, washed whole cucumbers.", "Put in next 3 items on top of pickles.", "Fill jar with vinegar.", "Let stand until December.", "Take out cucumbers and wash in cold water to remove alum and salt.", "Slice and put back in jar.", "Add sugar and water. Put lid back on jar.", "Turn upside down each day until sugar turns to syrup and comes up over pickles.", "They are ready to eat.", "Store in refrigerator."]

title: Easy Sweet And Sour Chicken

directions: ["In heavy skillet, melt butter; add sliced apples.", "Fry until tender.", "Add sugar and cinnamon to taste.", "Fry until caramelized but still juicy.", "Spoon onto warmed flour tortillas."]

title: Breakfast Casserole

title: Delicious Bread Pudding #1
ingredients: ["4 c. bread cubes", "2 c. milk, scalded with 1/4 c. butter", "1/2 c. sugar", "2 eggs, slightly beaten", "1/4 tsp. salt", "1 tsp. cinnamon", "1/2 c. raisins"]

title: Rolls

title: Lemon Coffee Cake

directions: ["Mix first 5 ingredients.", "Pour 1/2 of batter into a 10 x 12-inch greased baking dish.", "Mix sugar and cinnamon.", "Spread 1/2 over batter and 1/2 of nuts.", "Then add rest of batter, cinnamon and nuts.", "Bake at 350\u00b0 for 30 to 35 minutes.", "You can use any flavor cake mix and instant pudding you like."]

title: Frog Eye Salad

directions: ["Cream together sugar and butter.", "Add eggs, one at a time, beating well after each addition.", "Stir in bananas.", "Combine flour, baking powder and salt; stir into creamed mixture.", "Mix in nuts, if desired.", "Spoon into greased 9 x 5-inch loaf pan.", "Bake at 350\u00b0 for 1 hour, or until a toothpick inserted in the center comes out clean.", "Cool on rack.", "Makes 1 loaf."]

title: Pie Crust

directions: ["This recipe makes 3 or 4 pie crusts.", "Dough may be frozen in a freezer bag for future use."]

title: Hello Dolly
